channel.title: In need of a runescape web
channel.description:
Hey, im needing a website for my server so i can get online and get players! now i wanna be able to host this site from home so i need a easy setup and one that works from home :D if someone can please link me that will be great!!
p.s Iv googled and searched everywhere!!

item.title: In need of a runescape web
item.dc:creator: @gunnarx gunnarx
item.description:
@gunnarx wrote:

No i dont wanna pay, and im not looking for a webhost or a forum, i already have a forum setup with phpbb3 its free and effective, im wanting a real website with a news page to post and delete news, a server status page, donate page and a vote page, im wanting somthing has been released

Regarding new post, i dont like to read things i dont wanna, and then how the fuck are u supoose to get help with a website? this site doesnt have a forum for that, and its “server help” i need a site to launch my “server” there for needing “server help”

Read full topic
item.source: In need of a runescape web

item.title: In need of a runescape web
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

well if you are willing to pay for a website, go to godaddy.com…its cheap hosting that works good, but if you dont want to pay for a website, then google this---- free forums.
